title: Beating the clock - at work: the limits of human performance
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Steve Skok and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Looks at ways in which people try to enhance their performance levels in relation to real or perceived times and the ensuing results.
